title: Rogue
content: s the more DPS-focused subclass of the Rogue, being able to deal massive burst damage on a single attack. Especially effective against unprepared Enemies, and also against creatures that haven't taken a turn yet. At level 3, Assassins learn Assassinate: Initiative, which grants them Advantage on Attack Rolls against creatures that haven’t taken a turn yet.
